## SIGNUP\_MUTATION variable

The mutation is used to signup/register the user to the App. It checks wheather the user already registered or not. After validating, it creates a new user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SIGNUP_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/auth_mutations/signup.js)
